info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 16 at 4:22PM EDT until July 16 at 5:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Mecklenburg County in south central Virginia... * Until 500 PM EDT. * At 421 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Clarksville, or 11 miles south of Chase City, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Boydton around 440 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Nelson, Rogers Corner, Richardson, Beechwood, Buffalo Junction, Keats, John H Kerr Dam, Finchley, Eppes Fork and John H Kerr Reservoir. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
